question.short: Do genetically modified foods harm human health?
question.long: Have commercially consumed GMO foods caused measurable health effects at the population level ?

description: Results from studies evaluating the health effects of consuming foods made from genetically modified organisms (approved for human consumption).

no_consensus.description: The literature has not yet reached a consensus on the health effects of consuming approved GMO foods

no.description: The literature suggests that approved GMO foods do not harm human health

towards_no.description: The literature suggests that approved GMO foods probably do not harm human health, but more research is needed

towards_yes.description: The literature suggests that approved GMO foods may harm human health, but more research is needed

yes.description: The literature suggests that approved GMO foods harm human health

no.description: The results of the paper show no significant adverse health effects from consuming the approved GMO foods evaluated

no_unlike_literature.description: The results of the paper show no significant adverse health effects from consuming the approved GMO foods evaluated, unlike what is reported in the literature

no_but_mixed_results.description: The results of the paper show no significant overall adverse health effects from consuming the approved GMO foods evaluated, but there are mixed results in specific cases

maybe.description: The results of the paper suggest that approved GMO foods might have health effects, but the evidence is not strong enough to conclude

yes_but_low_confidence.description: The results of the paper suggest that approved GMO foods may harm health, but the evidence is not strong

yes_but_small_effect.description: The results of the paper suggest that approved GMO foods may have a small adverse effect on health

yes_unlike_literature.description: The results of the paper suggest that approved GMO foods may harm health, unlike what is reported in the literature

yes.description: The results of the paper suggest that consuming approved GMO foods harms human health

papers.title: Assessment of the health impact of GM plant diets in long-term and multigenerational animal feeding trials: A literature review
papers.quote: Results from all the 24 studies do not suggest any health hazards and, in general, there were no statistically significant differences within parameters observed

papers.title: Genetically Engineered Crops

institution.name: National Academies of Sciences, Engineering, and Medicine

papers.quote: GE food reveals no differences that would implicate a higher risk to human health from eating GE foods than from eating their non-GE counterparts. [...] The committee could not find persuasive evidence of adverse health effects directly attributable to consumption of GE foods
